channel.title: Why is there so many of
channel.description: People who "Copy" The whole base of moparisthebest.com , Like i mean i see people in their sigs who are like "Join *****!!" OR W/E.But i've seen SO MANY, And when i go to these sites to check it, Its a like a exact noob copy of moparisthebest..

item.title: Why is there so many of
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Although I’d have to say SMF is a pretty good forums, a simple modification and a new theme can make it look like vbulletin. I don’t understand why people keep the default theme after being here for 5~ minutes, I hated it and it took me atleast 1k posts to get used to it.

Read full topic
